definition: content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
east/host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)/landlord
Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)
Anthony and Cleopatra, 1606 tragedy by William Shakespeare 莎士比亞|莎士比亚
pinyin: An1 dong1 ni2 yu3 Ke4 li4 ao4 pei4 te4 la1
containing_words.word: 安東尼與克莉奧佩特拉

sentences.english: Bassanio tried to keep Antonio from accepting these terms.
sentences.chinese: 巴薩尼奧設法阻止安東尼奧接受條件。

sentences.english: A: I didn't know Anthony and Cicely were dating.
sentences.chinese: 我沒聽說安東尼和西塞莉在談戀愛啊。

sentences.english: D'Antoni spoke about what Hill may be able to bring to the Knicks.
sentences.chinese: 德安東尼也說了希爾會給尼克斯帶來什麼。

sentences.english: Tis the god Hercules, whom Antony loved, Now leaves him.
sentences.chinese: 這是安東尼所崇拜的赫剌克勒斯，現在離開他了。

sentences.english: Anthony wheedled. He badgered. He pouted. "Where would you get them?"
sentences.chinese: 安東尼開始花言巧語，繼而糾纏不休，最後撅起了嘴。

sentences.english: Anthony lost his job and his life on the fancy boats.
sentences.chinese: 安東尼失去了他的工作和他在豪華遊輪上的生活。

sentences.english: Indian Defense Minister Arackaparambil Kurian Antony says that has ramifications on this side of the border.
sentences.chinese: 印度國防部長安東尼說，這些鎮壓對印度也有影響。

sentences.english: Scarcely a day passed without a disagreement about the bands Anthony worshipped.
sentences.chinese: 幾乎每天我倆都會爲安東尼崇拜的樂隊爭吵。

sentences.english: "Everybody has to come back on the boards, " Anthony added, "not just me and LeBron …
sentences.chinese: “每個人都要爭取往籃下衝搶，”安東尼補充說。

sentences.english: Still, Anthony managed to pull Scott completely under him.
sentences.chinese: 但安東尼還是把斯科特完全拉到了自己身下。

sentences.english: Melo said. “I delivered a torta here and there, but it doesn’t add up to an income.”
sentences.chinese: 安東尼說，“我四處外送託塔餅，但收入遠遠不足。”

sentences.english: Anthony offerred the pattern plate of " of " Latin lover for us.
sentences.chinese: 安東尼爲我們提供了“拉丁情人”的模板。

sentences.english: You must except nevertheless Marcus Antonius the half partner of the empire of Rome and Appius Claudius the decemvir and lawgiver;
sentences.chinese: 因爲偉大的事業只有羅馬的安東尼和克勞底亞是例外。

sentences.english: Keith's father, Anthony, was going to be the one to give me away.
sentences.chinese: 基斯的父親安東尼爲我主婚。

sentences.english: Anthony Luong lines up his shot for the camera.
sentences.chinese: 安東尼陳德良行了他的鏡頭。

definition: the Franks (Germanic people who arrived in Europe from 600 AD and took over France)
